# CKA-Agent Project: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing

Official website for **CKA-Agent: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing** — a novel jailbreak framework achieving 96%+ success rates against state-of-the-art LLMs through adaptive tree search over correlated knowledge.

This project focuses on identifying vulnerabilities in LLM safety systems and advocating for enhanced defense mechanisms through responsible disclosure.

## Links

*   **Code Repository:** [Graph-COM/CKA-Agent](https://github.com/Graph-COM/CKA-Agent)
*   **Project Homepage:** [cka-agent.github.io](https://cka-agent.github.io)
*   **Associated Paper:**
    *   **Title:** A Wolf in Sheep’s Clothing: Bypassing Commercial LLM Guardrails via Harmless Prompt Weaving and Adaptive Tree Search
    *   **Status:** Preprint (November 2025)
    *   [Read more on arXiv](https://arxiv.org/)
